item.title: Advent of Code: Day 1
item.description: I’ve heard about Advent of Code before, but I never looked into it. After an urge for some programming and no real direction for a side project, I decided I’d try my hand at Advent of Code. To make a hard task even harder, I decided I’d try to solve the problems in Haskell. Problem Essentially, Day 1 of AoC boiled down into parsing an input file of integers and finding two things:
